00020 
00021 void NoneUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00022 {
00023         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00024         *output = atom_getfloat(inputAtoms);
00025 }
00026 
00027 
00028 void NoneUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00029 {
00030         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00031         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, *input);
00032 }
00033

00035 /***********************************************************************************************/
00036 NoneDataspace::NoneDataspace()
00037         : DataspaceLib("none", "none")
00038 {
00039         // Create one of each kind of unit, and cache them in a hash
00040         registerUnit(new NoneUnit,      gensym("none"));
00041         
00042         // Now that the cache is created, we can create a set of default units
00043         setInputUnit(neutralUnit);
00044         setOutputUnit(neutralUnit);
00045 }
00046

00048 NoneDataspace::~NoneDataspace()
00049 {
00050         ;
00051 }
